education and awareness in promoting mental health literacy.

Section 2: Stigma and Social Barriers

Stigma and social barriers can also contribute to the inability to recognize

mental health conditions. When individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds

or lower socioeconomic status experience mental health issues, they may be

less likely to seek help due to stigma, lack of access to resources, or other

barriers.
